translated: The crocodile needle (scientific name: Tylosurus crocodilus) is a carnivorous marine fish, very elongated body, and whose jaw forms a thin beak, trimmed with many small teeth.
original: L'aiguille crocodile (nom scientifique : Tylosurus crocodilus) est un poisson marin carnivore, au corps très allongé, et dont la mâchoire forme un bec fin, garni de nombreuses petites dents.
